issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Left semi join throws following error if where clause contains column name with table alias

select * from src_emptybucket_partitioned_1 e1 left semi join src_emptybucket_partitioned_3 e3 on e1.age =  e3.age where e1.year = 2015 and e3.year1=2016;

Similar inner join query works without any issues
{noformat}
select * from src_emptybucket_partitioned_1 e1 inner join src_emptybucket_partitioned_3 e3 on e1.age =  e3.age1 where e1.year = 2015 and e3.year1 = 2016;
Query ID = hrt_qa_20160610224945_9e5b40b7-8faf-4ef0-b1e1-741754fe2786
Total jobs = 1
Launching Job 1 out of 1


Status: Running (Executing on YARN cluster with App id application_1464125086069_0317)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        VERTICES      STATUS  TOTAL  COMPLETED  RUNNING  PENDING  FAILED  KILLED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map 1 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
Map 2 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERTICES: 02/02  [==========================>>] 100%  ELAPSED TIME: 6.92 s     
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OK
Time taken: 8.761 seconds
{noformat}

Source Tables Schema
{noformat}
desc src_emptybucket_partitioned_1;
OK
name                	string              	                    
age                 	int                 	                    
gpa                 	double              	                    
year                	int                 	                    
	 	 
# Partition Information	 	 
# col_name            	data_type           	comment             
	 	 
year                	int                 	                    
Time taken: 1.115 seconds, Fetched: 9 row(s)
hive> name1               	varchar(50)         	                    
age1                	bigint              	                    
gpa1                	decimal(38,18)      	                    
year1               	int                 	                    
	 	 
# Partition Information	 	 
# col_name            	data_type           	comment             
	 	 
year1               	int     
{noformat}

Left semi join query would work fine if I remove table alias from the query
{noformat}
hive> select * from src_emptybucket_partitioned_1  left semi join src_emptybucket_partitioned_3 on age =  age1 where year = 2015 and year1=2016;
Query ID = hrt_qa_20160610223932_4bf61489-b0eb-4533-9a24-77060aef417b
Total jobs = 1
Launching Job 1 out of 1


Status: Running (Executing on YARN cluster with App id application_1464125086069_0317)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        VERTICES      STATUS  TOTAL  COMPLETED  RUNNING  PENDING  FAILED  KILLED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map 1 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
Map 2 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERTICES: 02/02  [==========================>>] 100%  ELAPSED TIME: 8.33 s     
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OK
Time taken: 14.794 seconds
{noformat}

Left semi join query would also work if I keep column name in where clause from the table on left side of the join
{noformat}
hive> select * from src_emptybucket_partitioned_1 e1 left semi join src_emptybucket_partitioned_3 e3 on e1.age =  e3.age1 where e1.year = 2015;
Query ID = hrt_qa_20160610224621_25158eb4-ca9a-47ea-b33d-ee06f9979dec
Total jobs = 1
Launching Job 1 out of 1


Status: Running (Executing on YARN cluster with App id application_1464125086069_0317)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        VERTICES      STATUS  TOTAL  COMPLETED  RUNNING  PENDING  FAILED  KILLED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map 1 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
Map 2 ..........   SUCCEEDED      1          1        0        0       0       0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERTICES: 02/02  [==========================>>] 100%  ELAPSED TIME: 8.60 s     
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
OK
Time taken: 10.404 seconds
hive> select * from src_emptybucket_partitioned_1 e1 left semi join src_emptybucket_partitioned_3 e3 on e1.age =  e3.age1 where e3.year1 = 2016;
FAILED: SemanticException [Error 10004]: Line 1:122 Invalid table alias or column reference 'e3': (possible column names are: name, age, gpa, year)
{noformat}
fields.summary: left semi join should throw SemanticException if where clause contains columnname from right table
